Package Lab3.Tsynitska.KI305

Class BoatMovement

java.lang.Object
Lab3.Tsynitska.KI305.MotorBoat
Lab3.Tsynitska.KI305.BoatMovement
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoatActions, BoatEnter, BoatRepair
public class BoatMovement extends MotorBoat implements BoatActions, BoatRepair, BoatEnter
The BoatMovement class extends the MotorBoat class and implements interfaces related to boat actions, repair, and entry.
